channel.title: Resource manager on Micronaut MuShop
channel.description: Recent content in Resource manager on Micronaut MuShop

item.title: [Oracle Cloud] Resource manager
item.description: Prerequisites You need to have an Oracle Cloud Infrastructure account. Note that the charges will be applied since used services are not part of the Oracle Cloud Free Tier. Create stack To start with the OCI Resource Manager click on the following button: The link will redirect you to the Resource manager create stack page. Before the Resource manager will load the Terraform templates, you have to comply with Terms of Use.
